title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V1\SpeechRecognitionAlternative
name: SpeechRecognitionAlternative
description:
Alternative hypotheses (a.k.a. n-best list).

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v1.SpeechRecognitionAlternative

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getTranscript
methods.description:
Output-only Transcript text representing the words that the user spoke.

Generated from protobuf field string transcript = 1;

methods.name: setTranscript
methods.description:
Output-only Transcript text representing the words that the user spoke.

Generated from protobuf field string transcript = 1;

params.name: var
params.description: Output-only Transcript text representing the words that the user spoke.

methods.name: getConfidence
methods.description:
Output-only The confidence estimate between 0.0 and 1.0. A higher number indicates an estimated greater likelihood that the recognized words are correct. This field is typically provided only for the top hypothesis, and only for is_final=true results. Clients should not rely on the confidence field as it is not guaranteed to be accurate or consistent.

The default of 0.0 is a sentinel value indicating confidence was not set.

Generated from protobuf field float confidence = 2;
